fullplot: Killer-lovers Ned and Jude snatched a lot of diamonds in a jewellery store holdup, leaving three dead bodies. Ned is captured, but soon escapes and vows revenge on Jude, who pushed him out of escaping car. Ned is joined in his search for Jude by black female hitchhiker Bec.

title: Cold Around the Heart
